title: Fourth company awarded ventilator manufacturing license:Fawad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 20 (APP): Minister for Information and Broadcasting Chaudhry Fawad Hussain on Tuesday said that the fourth company has been awarded license to manufacture ventilators.
الحمداللہ سائنس منسٹری میں COVID کے دوران جو کام ہوا اس کے نتیجے میں چوتھی کمپنی کو بھی Ventillators بنانے کا لائسنس مل گیا ہے، اس سال مجھے پوری امید ہے کہ ہم ventsایکسپورٹ کرنا شروع کر دیں گے، فیصل آبادمیں ہیلتھ سٹی بنایا تھاستمبر میں Auto disposable سرنج بنانا شروع ہوں گے
— Ch Fawad Hussain (@fawadchaudhry) July 20, 2021
In a tweet, he said another company was awarded the license as result of the work done by the Ministry of Science and Technology during Covid-19 pandemic.
Hopefully, he said, the country would definitely start exporting ventilators this year.
Health city was built in Faisalabad, he said adding that the country would also start manufacturing auto disposable syringes in the upcoming September.
